name: Viki Spotter: School
description: Here is a puzzle game that will put you in front of a difficult task - to help the little girl Viki Spotter find all the differences in the pictures, which are in the game are much.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
